entry.title: Hate You, Want You
entry.summary:
Author: robinkink

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,774Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: Still smiling, Damian brushed past him without another word. That smirk never left his face, even as the darkness of the woods swallowed him whole. And Tim was alone. Alone with his uneven breaths. Alone with the bitter taste of something he couldn’t name. Alone with the humiliating knowledge that he spent the rest of his patrol thinking about giving in, about just jerking off to relieve the throbbing erection straining in his shorts… An erection Damian had definitely felt when Tim shoved him against that tree. Oh, Tim Drake was so utterly, completely screwed. Tim Drake just wanted to survive one last summer as a camp counselor. Then he caught Damian Wayne and Jon Kent breaking curfew in a very… unconventional way. Everything went downhill from there — including Tim’s self-control.
